biotools.summary: The SHARK-dive CLI is a homology classifier trained to detect remote evolutionary homology and functional analogy for intrinsically disordered regions (IDRs) and other difficult-to-align protein regions. Since SHARK-dive is trained specifically on a set of disordered, difficult-to-align sequences, its performance is best suited for unalignable IDRs.
